line.comment: * 2300 is slightly bigger than Argon Equipment Dock which drones repair without a problem.
* this task is stopped, so the following should not be necessary
* $message = sprintf: fmt='Repair Flying Away from %s. x: %s y: %s z: %s', $victim, $xPos, $yPos, $zPos, null
*1600 gives vector length of 2771m. Repair laser range is 2200m.

sval.val: 2300 is slightly bigger than Argon Equipment Dock which drones repair without a problem.
this task is stopped, so the following should not be necessary
$message = sprintf: fmt='Repair Flying Away from %s. x: %s y: %s z: %s', $victim, $xPos, $yPos, $zPos, null
1600 gives vector length of 2771m. Repair laser range is 2200m.
